alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Elmore and west central Owyhee Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of North Fork Owyhee Campground to 6 miles southwest of Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indian Meadows, Hackberry Reservoir, Slack Mountain and Triangle around 730 PM MDT. South Mountain and Toy Pass around 740 PM MDT. Black Warrior Mountain around 750 PM MDT. Grand View, Mountain Home Air Force Base, Hinton Reservoir and C J Strike Dam around 800 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
